oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: John T. Wilder corresondence with Martha Wilder, 1863 April 1
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Wilder, John Thomas, 1830-1917
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Letter from J. T. Wilder to his wife Martha describing the capture of Confederate prisoners, horses, and supplies. He includes a post script asking Martha to join him in Murfreesboro.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: United States -- History -- Civil War, 1861-1865; United States -- History -- Civil War, 1861-1865 -- Destruction and pillage
Lilly, Eli, 1838-1898; Lilly, Emily Lemen; Shields, Green F.; Wharton, Gabriel Colvin, 1824-1906
Confederate States of America. Army. Wharton's Brigade
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:source: John T. Wilder correspondence with Martha Wilder, 1861-1865
